text:
[Verse]
Sun is shining bright today
Birds are singing feel okay
Winds are dancing skies are blue
Everything feels so brand new

[Verse 2]
Kids are playing out in yards
Catch the breeze and throwing cards
Laughing running feeling free
Joy is all that we can see

[Chorus]
Sunny days sunny days
Everything's a golden haze
Sunny days sunny days
Joy is here it's here to stay

[Verse 3]
Walk the dog down to the park
Stay outside till it gets dark
Neighbors smile and wave hello
In the sun we feel the glow

[Verse 4]
Ice cream cones and lemonade
Summertime and cool shades
Picnics under big oak trees
Lazy days with gentle breeze

[Chorus]
Sunny days sunny days
Everything's a golden haze
Sunny days sunny days
Joy is here it's here to stay
title: Sunny Days
